results.t: What's the backend stack of Duckduckgo?
results.p: What's the backend stack of Duckduckgo? · nginx · Perl (via FastCGI) · PostgreSQL · FreeBSD with some Ubuntu instances for failover, running on.

results.t: Now DuckDuckGo is building its own desktop browser
results.p: Dec 22, 2021 — DuckDuckGo for desktop will be ready to become your new everyday browsing app. It seems they are making the desktop equivalent of Firefox Focus.
